slim led crystal light box/ advertising light box
Features:
1. Adopt optical laser engraving LGP, 10years long lifespan
2. LED strip as light source, safe and energy saving, 80,000 hours
3. Elegant profile, crystal frame
4. Thickness: different dimensionss can be required
5. Certificate adaptor (100v-240v)
6. Widely application in hotel, fast food restaurant, chain store, wedding photo studio, indoor ornament, company sign, gift show, showcase display and so on.
